pradarshanaya narambaana athara wimal wirawansha mahathata ekthara pradarshana kutiyaka pradarshakayaku lesa katayuthu karamin siti aananda widuhale shishyayaku wana thama puthanuwan da dakagatha haki wiya.“wade nam hari ihalayi” puthanuwan athulu pirisa siti kutiyen nikmena atharathura wimal wirawansha pawasuwe ema sisu pirisa thawaduratath dirimath karawamini.pradarshana bhumiyen pitawimata sudanamwa pradarshana kuti wethin iwathata pamini wimal wirawansha athulu aaradhitha pirisage neth yomu wuye dehiwala balika widuhalaka sisu dariyan ranga dakwu widi natyayak kerehiya.
eda japanayen labunu budu pilimayak ethuma buddhagaya puda bimehi thanpath kale apa maha bosathanan wahanse nawatha jiwamanawa wada sitina bawa mulu lokayata penwamini.

ewani katayuththakata pamini kandayamakata siduwu darunu khedawachakayak wiharadhipathi na himiyan mese wisthara kalaha.

prathi-pilithuru sapayima	2015 mayi 8
apa jaya nogathahoth apage sharirasaukhyayata ahitha karawi radira pidanaya.
kathi alan nam adala tharuniya bimathin riya padawa shishyayeku anathurata path kirima nisa athadanguwata gena bandhanagara gatha kara thibuna.
amathya mandala sanshodhanayedi jathika washayen wadagath wishayan widyanukulawa gasat kirime wadagathkama da janadhipathiwarayath, agamathiwarayath ee sakachchawedi penwa denu labuha.
ewaka ‘sarasawiya’ puwathpathe karthru dhuraya daru anura bandara rajaguru eya dutuweya.’mokada lestar gana pothak karanawada?’ohu apen wimasiya.
